# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just any item; it's a symbol of excellence and value. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth every penny of its $100 value to you. Considering its immense worth, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it directly from us at the same price of $100. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
